title: Alerts
description: This schema defines the Alert entity. An Alert has trigger, filters and NotificationEndpoints

rules.description: A set of filter rules associated with the Alert.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies this Alert.

name.description: Name that uniquely identifies this Alert.

fullyQualifiedName.description: Name that uniquely identifies a Alert.

description.description: A short description of the Alert, comprehensible to regular users.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the Alert in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

changeDescription.description: Change that led to this version of the Alert.

filteringRules.description: Set of rules that the Alert Contains to allow conditional control for alerting.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.
